name: Chinese Vocab
description: Chinese Vocab is a helpful tool to learn the Chinese language and prepare for the HSK(Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi, the official Chinese proficiency test) exam by studying HSK vocabulary. It contains a dictionary of over 26,000 words required for the exam across beginner to advanced levels which can be searched on using Chinese words.  Study Plan: Customizable regular quantitative to learn vocabulary by daily, weekly, or monthly. Provide self-planning to learn your favoriate words. Also provide the analysis capabilities to see learning progress.  Highlight Features: 1.Provides a richer Chinese database. 2.Support to show simplified Chinese and traditional Chinese. 3.Offers five-star types for favorite category. 4.Allow speak Chinese voice included network voice or TTS voice. 5.Support user defined book to add words as well as provide editing. 6.Provides a function to display Chinese or English only for remember. 7.Provide options for exam including time limitation, the number of questions, and testing types.
